entries.content: Figure out the main reasons why people historically haven't bought from you.
Use the common reasons people don't buy as proactive disqualifiers at the beginning of your meetings.
"Can I tell you the three reasons why we're probably not going to work together?"
entries.notes: Proactive phrase to diagnose potential barriers upfront.

entries.content: When stating reasons for not working together, the prospect will either agree (confirm disqualification) or disagree (require further probing).
If a prospect disagrees with your stated reasons for not working together, challenge them with 'Well, why not?' to understand their actual position.
entries.notes: Probing when the prospect indicates potential interest despite perceived barriers.

entries.content: Closing is getting the right outcome, and sometimes the right outcome is 'no'.

focus_area: Handling "Not Interested": Probe softly, diagnose if disinterest or timing
